name: Amblyantha
description:
Amblyantha is a lightweight, engine-building strategy game.

GENERATE APPEAL

In Amblyantha, you play as a botanist with the goal of growing a garden of beautiful flowers. Each of your flowers has powerful abilities to help you generate massive appeal. Your final score at the end of the year is determined by the total appeal of the flowers in your garden. 

CONTROL THE FORCES OF NATURE

Upgrade your forecast and adapt your garden to the changing weather, or take matters into your own hands and guide the sun, rain, and snow with your flowers' abilities.

ASCEND TO NEW HEIGHTS

Level up your flowers as they reach for the skies, powering up their abilities.
